title: Interpret the Truth
description: Whoever plays this Companion will be shown 'facts' about themselves or the world we live in. Your job is to decide if what you're being shown is true or false. Use the left button to choose true and the right to choose false. How susceptible are you to fake facts?
players: This game supports 1 or 2 players. Scan your BioBracelet to begin and again anytime to logout.
